channel.title: Pages on Rob Coleman
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Rob Coleman

item.title: About
item.author: coleman.rob+nospam@gmail.com (Rob Coleman)
item.description: Hi, I’m Rob a government researcher in the field of employment and training. I studied political science and other fun subjects in school. Now I spend a lot of time analyzing data using #rstats and building things on the web. I live in the frozen Canadian north with my partner and this guy: View this post on Instagram Barn yard! A post shared by Rob (@robcoleman) on Aug 24, 2017 at 3:04pm PDT

item.title: Books
item.author: coleman.rob+nospam@gmail.com (Rob Coleman)
item.description: 2019 Title Author Rating Just Mercy: A Story of Justice and Redemption Bryan Stevenson ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ The Black Swan: The Impact of the Highly Improbable Nassim Nicholas Taleb ⭐️⭐️⭐️ 2018 Title Author Rating The Great Stagnation: How America Ate All the Low-Hanging Fruit of Modern History, Got Sick, and Will (Eventually) Feel Better Tyler Cowen ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ Educated Tara Westover ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ The Undoing Project: A Friendship That Changed Our Minds Michael Lewis ⭐️⭐️⭐️ Seven Fallen Feathers: Racism, Death, and Hard Truths in a Northern City Tanya Talaga ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ Robot-Proof: Higher Education in the Age of Artificial Intelligence Joseph E.
